channel.title: Prophet on Laxmikant Soni

item.title: Time-Series Forecasting
item.description: HUGOMORE42 What is time series? A time series is a series of observations collected at some time intervals. Time is an important component here. The observations collected are dependent on the time at which it is collected. The sale items in a retail store like Walmart will be a time series. The sale could be at daily level or weekly level. The number of people flying from Bangalore to delhi on daily basis is a time series.
